input.sentences: i went to a baby shower of a friend of mine | they little girl was being named [female] .

output.sentences: The shower had a cake which was named with the name I picked out.
A lot of her relatives attended.
The mom looked happy in the picture.
There was plenty of finger foods and lots of cake.
The party was pretty nice and really enjoyable.
